thumbnail.blurb: ESIP indicator reporting tool tracks precipitation and air temperature at sites around the Gulf of Maine

thumbnail.title: Northeast US Climate Summary: Average Temperature (30 day)
thumbnail.blurb: Regional average temperatures (°F) over the previous 30 days

thumbnail.blurb: Regional departure from normal precipitation (inches) over the previous 30 days

thumbnail.title: Northeast US Climate Summary: Percent of Normal Precipitation (30 day)
thumbnail.blurb: Regional percent of normal precipitation (inches) over the previous 30 days

thumbnail.title: Northeast US Climate Summary: Standardized Precipitation Index (30 day)
thumbnail.blurb: This regional SPI helps monitor drought (depicting the severity of precipitation anomalies) offering a probability index based only on precipitation (inches) over the previous 30 days

thumbnail.title: Southeast US Climate Summary: Percent of Normal Precipitation (30 day)

thumbnail.title: Extreme Precipitation (New York & New England
thumbnail.blurb: An interactive map links to data sets with extreme precipitation estimates (inches) by location ranging from one day to 500 years
thumbnail.source: Northeast Regional Climate Center/Natural Resources Conservation Service

thumbnail.title: Growing Degree Days Forecast (Northeast US base 50 °F)
thumbnail.blurb: Maps depicting growing degree days (GDD) for the past month and season to date; GDD forecast for the coming week; and GDD comparisons with previous season and long-term average.
thumbnail.source: Cornell University Atmospheric Science & Turf Team

thumbnail.title: Soil Temperature (Northeast US, daily)
thumbnail.blurb: Daily average soil temperature (two-inch depth in °F)
thumbnail.source: Cornell University Atmospheric Science & Turf Team

thumbnail.title: Heat Stress Index (US Northeast, past week)
thumbnail.blurb: Map records no, moderate and high heat stress (defined as a nighttime hour when the sum of the temperature (°F) and relative humidity (%) exceeds 150). Red dots indicate eight or more heat stress hours.
thumbnail.source: Cornell University Atmospheric Science & Turf Team

thumbnail.title: Heat Stress Forecast (Northeast US, 1-week)
thumbnail.blurb: One-week forecast for risks of high heat stress (defined as a nighttime hour when the sum of the temperature (°F) and relative humidity (%) exceeds 150). Red dots indicate at least two high heat stress days or consistent moderate risk.
thumbnail.source: Cornell University Atmospheric Science & Turf Team

thumbnail.title: Moisture Deficit (US northeast, preceding week)
thumbnail.blurb: Regional moisture deficit (rainfall minus evaporation) over the past week
thumbnail.source: Northeast Region Climate Center/Cornell University Entomology

thumbnail.title: Moisture Deficit (US northeast, season to date)
thumbnail.blurb: Regional moisture deficit (rainfall minus evaporation) over the mosquito season to date
thumbnail.source: Northeast Region Climate Center/Cornell University Entomology

thumbnail.title: Northeast US Drought Monitor
thumbnail.blurb: Frequently updated map of regional drought condition intensity, with percentage area statistics going back one year

thumbnail.title: Middle Atlantic Precipitation Departure Maps (US)
thumbnail.blurb: Regional departure from normal precipitation (inches) for year to date, month to date or last 7- to 365 days.
thumbnail.source: NOAA NWS Middle Atlantic River Forecast Center

thumbnail.title: Accumulated Ohio Precipitation, Total Precipitation & Departure (US)
thumbnail.blurb: 24-hr through 96-hr Accumulated Precipitation and 7-day through 90-day total precipitation and departure
thumbnail.source: NOAA NWS Ohio River Forecast Center

thumbnail.keywords: Eastern Drought & Stream Flow— Derivative Products
thumbnail.title: Northeast US Rivers—Month-to-Date up to Year-to-Date Precipitation
thumbnail.blurb: Recent precipitation trends affecting regional water supplies
thumbnail.source: NOAA NWS Northeast River Forecast Ctr

thumbnail.keywords: Eastern Drought & Stream Flow— Derivative Products
thumbnail.title: Northeast US Rivers—Month-to-Date up to Year-to-Date Departures from Normal
thumbnail.blurb: Recent precipitation trends compared to the 30-year “normal” for the same period
thumbnail.source: NOAA NWS Northeast River Forecast Ctr

thumbnail.title: Current Snowfall (Northeast US)
thumbnail.blurb: Depicts daily snowfall in inches
thumbnail.source: NOAA NWS Northeast River Forecast Ctr

thumbnail.title: Current Snow Depth (Northeast US)
thumbnail.blurb: Current regional snow depth, updated daily
thumbnail.source: NOAA NWS Northeast River Forecast Ctr

thumbnail.title: Modelled Snow Depth (Northeast US)
thumbnail.blurb: Interactive snow information with depth of shallow snow (up to 24 inches)
thumbnail.source: NOAA National Operational Hydrologic Remote Sensing Center

thumbnail.title: Northeast Regional Seasonal Snowfall
thumbnail.blurb: Customizable regional map of snowfall totals

thumbnail.title: Snowfall Index (US Regional)
thumbnail.blurb: Interactive map providing regional snowfall data

thumbnail.title: Snow Water Equivalent Map (Northeast US)
thumbnail.blurb: Interactive map with modeled regional snow accumulation in inches of water equivalent
thumbnail.source: NOAA National Operational Hydrologic Remote Sensing Center

thumbnail.title: Gulf of Maine Sea-surface Temperature
thumbnail.blurb: Past daily satellite images of Gulf of Maine sea-surface temperature
thumbnail.source: Northeastern Regional Association of Coastal and Ocean Observing Systems

thumbnail.title: Sea-surface Temperature and Water Currents (Northeast US)
thumbnail.blurb: Web-mapping portal with real-time coastal observations with air and water temperatures, currents, weather radar and more

thumbnail.title: Regional Ocean Buoy Data
thumbnail.blurb: Real-time data (wind speed/direction, wave height/period, air/water temperature, air pressure, visibility, salinity from buoys between New York and Nova Scotia
thumbnail.source: Northeastern Regional Association of Coastal and Ocean Observing Systems

thumbnail.title: Northeast and Coastal Ocean Forecast System
thumbnail.blurb: Model viewer with wind, precipitation, air temperature, relative humidity, sea level pressure Northeastern Regional Association of Coastal and Ocean Observing Systems
thumbnail.source: Northeastern Regional Association of Coastal and Ocean Observing Systems

thumbnail.keywords: Eastern Ocean Conditions: Waves, Currents and Tides
thumbnail.title: Northeastern US Storm Surge/Tidal Predications & Observations Maps and Data Sets
thumbnail.blurb: Charts and datasets for numerous settings along the Eastern seaboard with tide predictions, surge guidance, anomalies and more

thumbnail.keywords: Eastern Ocean Conditions: Waves, Currents and Tides
thumbnail.title: North Atlantic Wave Forecast
thumbnail.blurb: Updated several times daily, these forecasts include significant wave height, wave direction and wave periods
thumbnail.source: Northeastern Regional Association of Coastal and Ocean Observing Systems

thumbnail.title: Ocean Color Northeast
thumbnail.blurb: Remote Sensing Reflectance at 667 nm: Bimonthly Mean
thumbnail.source: NOAA Office of Satellite and Product Operations

thumbnail.title: Northwest Atlantic Coastal Surface Currents
thumbnail.blurb: High-frequency radar stations report on changes in coastal surface currents along Eastern US Coast (with one site each in NB and NS)
thumbnail.source: Northeastern Regional Association of Coastal and Ocean Observing Systems

thumbnail.title: Climate Central Surging Seas Viewer (Northeast US)
thumbnail.blurb: Includes maps, forecasts, risk analysis and comparisons for selected urban coastal areas

thumbnail.title: Weekly Extreme Maximum Temperature (US)
thumbnail.blurb: National US map of extreme high temperatures (°F), recorded weekly

thumbnail.title: Weekly Extreme Minimum Temperature (US)
thumbnail.blurb: National US map of extreme low temperatures (°F), recorded weekly

thumbnail.title: Precipitation (US—daily observations)
thumbnail.blurb: Interactive map depicting one-day observed precipitation
thumbnail.source: NOAA NWS Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service

thumbnail.title: Precipitation (US—daily observations)
thumbnail.blurb: National and state maps with data from volunteers’ sites depicting one-day observed precipitation
thumbnail.source: Community Collaborative Rain, Hail & Snow Network

thumbnail.title: US Regional Forecast Centers (including River Forecast Centers)
thumbnail.blurb: National interactive map depicting where river gauges have recorded flooding in past 24 hours

thumbnail.title: US Graphical Forecasts
thumbnail.blurb: Interactive map offering a regional snapshot with views of max/min temperatures, probability of precipitation, weather, hazards, dewpoint, relative humidity, wind speed, wind gusts, sky cover, snow amount, ice accumulation and more.

thumbnail.title: US Animated Forecasts
thumbnail.blurb: Weather Prediction Center’s loop of sea-level pressures and fronts (medium range, days 3-7); and 18-, 24-, 30-,36-, 48- and 60-hour forecasts of fronts/pressures.

thumbnail.title: US Quantitative Precipitation Forecasts (1- through 7-day)
thumbnail.blurb: National map of precipitation forecast (inches per day)

thumbnail.title: CPC Crop Moisture Index (weekly)
thumbnail.blurb: National map of short-term need for moisture versus available water (inches) in a shallow soil profile updated weekly
thumbnail.source: NOAA NWS Climate Prediction Center Drought Monitoring

thumbnail.title: Cosmos Soil Moisture Probes (US)
thumbnail.blurb: National map with several eastern sites depicting recent percentage of soil moisture and offering data sets of seasonal change since installation.
thumbnail.source: Cosmic-ray Soil Moisture Observing System (NSF Project)

thumbnail.title: Seasonal Drought Outlook (US)
thumbnail.blurb: Depicts drought tendency during the current/upcoming three-month period indicating areas within the US where drought is likely to persist/intensify, diminish or develop

thumbnail.title: CPC Drought Severity Index (US)
thumbnail.blurb: Updated weekly, this national map helps illustrate the duration and intensity of the long-term drought-inducing circulation patterns (incorporating current weather patterns and cumulative patterns from previous months).

thumbnail.title: Current Streamflow (US)
thumbnail.blurb: Real-time streamflow compared to historical streamflow on interactive national map (updated daily)

thumbnail.title: Below-normal Streamflow (US, compared to historical, by day)
thumbnail.blurb: Below-normal streamflow (7-day average), by state, as compared to historical streamflow for the same time period

thumbnail.title: Flood and High Flow (US)
thumbnail.blurb: Flood and high-flow conditions at gauge stations by state (percentile of flood stage)

thumbnail.keywords: National Drought & Stream Flow— Forecasts and Projections
thumbnail.title: Seasonal Drought Outlook (US)
thumbnail.blurb: Depicts drought tendency during the current/upcoming three-month period, indicating areas within the US where drought is likely to persist/intensify, diminish or develop

thumbnail.title: US Hazards Outlook (3- to 14-day)
thumbnail.blurb: Interactive map depicting short- to medium-range hazards outlook encompassing winds, waves, precipitation, unusually high or low temperatures, drought and flooding.

storms.thumbnail: National Tropical Cyclones (Hurricanes) and Storms Severe Weather Events (US) Updated daily, reports from around the US of tornados, wind storms and hail storms NOAA NWS Storm Prediction Center, http://www.spc.noaa.gov/climo/reports/today.html http://www.spc.noaa.gov/climo/reports/today_filtered.gif

thumbnail.title: Convective and Thunderstorm Outlook (US)
thumbnail.blurb: One- through 8-day national outlook for severe storms involving hail, wind or tornados and a national map depicting percentage likelihood of thunderstorm occurrences

thumbnail.title: NCDC Extreme Weather and Climate Events
thumbnail.blurb: Portal to pages on hurricanes, tornados, North American and worldwide weather extremes, El Nino/La Nina, global climate change and more.

thumbnail.title: Experimental US Map of Potential Storm Surge Flooding
thumbnail.blurb: An experimental localized map of potential storm surge flooding on which NWS seeks feedback—see source link for details

thumbnail.title: Historical Hurricane Tracks
thumbnail.blurb: Interactive US map that can be searched by storm or location

link.display: East Coast Winter Storms: Historical and Analogue Storm Tracks and Surges

thumbnail.title: Sea-level Rise Viewer (US)
thumbnail.blurb: Interactive map depicting 1- to 6-foot sea-level rise impacts along US Coasts

thumbnail.title: Hurricane-induced Coastal Erosion Hazards (US)
thumbnail.blurb: Interactive map depicts most erosion-prone areas, with layers for coastal change probabilities, dune elevations and water levels

thumbnail.title: Sea-level Trends (US and Canada)
thumbnail.blurb: Interactive map shows sea-level trends in mm/year for Canadian sites and feet/century (US)

thumbnail.title: Sea-level Rise Tool for Sandy Recovery
thumbnail.blurb: Resources targeted to Communities affected by Hurricane Sandy, including a sea-level change calculator

thumbnail.title: Current Observations and Forecasts (Atlantic Provinces)
thumbnail.blurb: Current air temperature (°C), with comparable maps depicting rainfall, wind, humidity, degree days and crop-specific data

thumbnail.title: Canada Weather Radar
thumbnail.blurb: Interactive national map depicting current precipitation (from light to heavy)

thumbnail.title: Canadian Climate Data
thumbnail.blurb: Historical Climate Data, Historical Radar, Engineeering Climate Data Sets, Climate Normals and Monthly Climate Summaries

thumbnail.title: Canada Temperature and Precipitation Forecasts
thumbnail.blurb: Probabilistic forecasts for current/upcoming season

thumbnail.title: Agriclimate Maps and Data (Canada)
thumbnail.blurb: Accumulated precipitation, percent of normal precipitation, difference from normal precipitation, percentile precipitation, dry spell and temperature

thumbnail.title: Canadian Streamflow
thumbnail.blurb: Maps depicting real-time hydrometric (water level and streamflow) data collected at more than 1,700 locations

thumbnail.title: Canadian Ice Service—East Coast
thumbnail.blurb: Ice charts for areas within the East Coast region

thumbnail.title: Canadian Online Scientific Buoys
thumbnail.blurb: Real-time monitoring of water temperature, salinity, water density, fluorescence and organic matter

thumbnail.title: Canadian Oceanographic Database (Registration Required)
thumbnail.blurb: Datasets on sea-surface temperature, coastal time series, temperature-salinity profiles, and ocean color

thumbnail.keywords: Canada Ocean Conditions: Waves, Currents and Tides
thumbnail.title: Canadian Wave Height Map
thumbnail.blurb: Current marine watches and warnings

thumbnail.title: Atlantic Tropical Weather Outlook
thumbnail.blurb: Updated four times daily between June and November, these maps summarize tropical weather outlooks, depict active storms and offers marine forecasts

thumbnail.title: Global Tropical Cyclone Tracks
thumbnail.blurb: Global depiction of tropical cyclone tracks from 4 years (spanning from 1851 to 2008) and a cumulative image that clearly shows the storms’ global patterns

thumbnail.title: North Atlantic Hurricane Tracking Chart (most recent annual)
thumbnail.blurb: Tracks of Hurricanes, Tropical Storms, Subtropical Storms and Wave/Lows through the North Atlantic in the previous calendar year, with numbered list of named storms

thumbnail.title: Precipitation Anomalies
thumbnail.blurb: Rainfall anomaly made by comparing rainfall data compiled during the twelve-year period from 2001-2012 to near real-time. This product is updated daily.

thumbnail.title: Weekly Global Rainfall
thumbnail.blurb: Rainfall added up over the course of the last week. This product is updated daily.

thumbnail.title: Daily Snow Cover
thumbnail.blurb: Global view of current snow cover with historic maps searchable by day and year

thumbnail.title: Atlantic Sea-surface Temperature (Reynolds Daily Loop)
thumbnail.blurb: Real-time sea-surface temperature (in °C) analyzed daily

thumbnail.title: Atlantic Sea-surface Temperature (Reynolds 7-Day Analysis)
thumbnail.blurb: Real-time sea-surface temperature (in °C) analyzed weekly

thumbnail.title: Atlantic Sea-surface Temperature (Anomaly)
thumbnail.blurb: Real-time sea-surface temperature anomalies (in °C)

thumbnail.title: Sea-surface Temperature Anomalies—Historical to 1985
thumbnail.blurb: 8-day and monthly anomalies in sea-surface temperature showing discrepancies from the climatological average during the selected period
thumbnail.source: University of Maine Satellite Oceanography Data Lab

thumbnail.keywords: Global Ocean Conditions: Waves, Currents and Tides
thumbnail.title: West Atlantic Surface Analysis
thumbnail.blurb: Daily forecast tracks

thumbnail.keywords: Global Ocean Conditions: Waves, Currents and Tides
thumbnail.title: West Atlantic Wind and Wave Analysis
thumbnail.blurb: Includes significant wave height (average height of highest one-third of the waves)

thumbnail.keywords: Global Ocean Conditions: Waves, Currents and Tides
thumbnail.title: West Atlantic Currents
thumbnail.blurb: Graphic depiction of global real-time operational forecast system changes in Gulf Stream region spanning recent days

thumbnail.keywords: Global Ocean Conditions: Waves, Currents and Tides
thumbnail.title: Wave Period Atlantic Seaboard
thumbnail.blurb: 24-, 48- and 96-hour wave period and direction

thumbnail.keywords: Global Ocean Conditions: Waves, Currents and Tides
thumbnail.title: Atlantic Significant Wave Height and Peak Direction Forecast
thumbnail.blurb: Includes wind sea wave height, primary and secondary swell wave height, peak wave period, wind sea period and primary and secondary swell periods.

thumbnail.keywords: Global Ocean Conditions: ENSO and Other Climate Indices
thumbnail.title: Madden/Julian Oscillation
thumbnail.blurb: Depicts this tropical disturbance that has wide-ranging impacts on precipitation, atmospheric circulation, and surface temperature and potential ENSO impacts

thumbnail.keywords: Global Ocean Conditions: ENSO and Other Climate Indices
thumbnail.title: Tropical Pacific Sea-Surface Temperatures (ENSO)
thumbnail.blurb: Weekly averaged sea-surface temperatures and anomalies spanning past twelve weeks

North Atlantic Oscillation: Current conditions and outlooks as well as the daily NAO index for the past 120 days
